name: To the Moon (itch) (Awesomebread Studios)
description:
To the Moon

The evil Hedgelord has taken over the galaxy and it's up to you to stop him!   Take flight in your rocket and battle wave after wave of hedglings, as you go to the moon and beyond in a desperate attempt to vanquish evil and collect tendies to heal your craft and increase your rewards.

Do you have what it takes to save the universe?

Recommended Specs
  • Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380X*
  • 4GB RAM
  • 2 GB Hard Drive Space
Minimum Specs
  • Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Integrated Graphics*
  • 2GB RAM
  • 2 GB Hard Drive Space
*Some older hardware/drivers may have issues some shaders.
